modName: Dark0nes Audio Blog - State of the Union
summary: The second blog by Dark0ne (creator of the Nexus sites), this blog covers the recent introduction of Steam Workshop to the community, what we've been working on and what we have planned in the not too distant future.
descriptionHtml:
The second blog by Dark0ne (creator of the Nexus sites), this blog covers the recent introduction of Steam Workshop to the community, what we've been working on and what we have planned in the not too distant future.

This is an audio version of the video blog that can be found [url=http://youtu.be/8OiuGdOE8dk]here[/url]. I am uploading it for those users who like to listen to podcasts or interviews on their portable audio devices (like an iPod) rather than watching them on YouTube.
author: Dark0ne
